activities: Personal data received by Unitas Global may vary depending on the nature of the respective business activities but can include personal data received and processed by Unitas Global; (1) for sales and marketing activities; (2) for use in connection with our website (3) to operate, maintain, develop and improve our products and services including our support and maintenance services (4) to enable and effect business transactions (5) for use in a cloud services offering where Unitas Global operates as a cloud hosting provider (6) otherwise received on behalf of business customers as a service provider or data processor.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line data, on-line data, manually processed data
recoursemech: Unitas Global will co-operate with the EU/EEA Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)
